thread.title: SUSANNA FLORA

author: SUSANNA FLORA
title: SUSANNA FLORA
text: I needed new contacts and was going to get them from another vendor that I used to buy from, they boasted one price and when I went to order the price was considerable higher. I decided to search for a more reasonable price and found OptiContacts.com where the price was half of what the other vendor was. I ordered my contacts and received them in record time. Hooray for you OptiContacts.com!!!
